title: Ramanujan Graphs and Interlacing Families
abstract:
This survey accompanies a lecture on the paper ``Interlacing Families I:
Bipartite Ramanujan Graphs of All Degrees'' by A. Marcus, D. Spielman, and N.
Srivastava at the 2024 International Congress of Basic Science (ICBS) in July,
2024. Its purpose is to explain the developments surrounding this work over the
past ten or so years, with an emphasis on connections to other areas of
mathematics. Earlier surveys about the interlacing families method by the same
authors focused on applications in functional analysis, whereas the focus here
is on applications in spectral graph theory.
